text: Bærum () is a city in Akershus County, Norway. The city was created as a municipality on 1 January 1838. It is a suburb of Oslo, Bærum is located on the west coast of the city. Bærum has the highest income per capita in Norway and the highest proportion of university-educated individuals. The municipality has been voted the best Norwegian place to live in considering governance and public services to citizens. ==Related pages== *List of mayors in Norway that are elected until 2027 ==References== Category:Cities in Norway Category:Municipalities of Akershus
title: Bærum
